contest-event.event-date:
March 29, 1980 D Welsh Area Championship (Fourth Section)
Welsh Area Championship (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest Welsh Area Championship welsh-area-championship-fourth-section
None Wales
Fourth
Overture to Youth
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Due to a dispute with the National organiser, in 1980 the Welsh area was run unofficially, without accreditation to the national contest. The 1979 Welsh section winners were invited to the 1980 finals. An account of events and the dispute is given at http://www.4barsrest.com/articles/2010/1102.asp?l=in#.Wh3ZQVVl-Uk.
Jan. 7, 2012, 6:33 p.m. Nov. 28, 2017, 10:58 p.m.
1 South Glamorgan Youth Brass Band Dewi Jones
2 Pontypool Brass Alun Williams
3 Crwbin Silver Band Don Hendy
4 Tenby & District C. Llewellyn
